body:
It seems that there is an invalid submodule in the repo.

And it is a bug on Gitea side, it shouldn't panic ...

-> Fix submodule nil check #35096
As a workaround, you can also downgrade to 1.24.2 temporarily

issue.body:
Follow up #35096, fix #35095, fix #35115 and add more tests

The old code used some fragile behaviors which depend on the "nil" receiver. This PR should be a complete fix for more edge cases.

issue.body:
Backport #35109 by wxiaoguang

Follow up #35096, fix #35095, fix #35115 and add more tests

The old code used some fragile behaviors which depend on the "nil" receiver. This PR should be a complete fix for more edge cases.

body:
1.24 nightly (will be 1.24.4 soon), it is a stable release, and contains the new fix:

* https://dl.gitea.com/gitea/1.24-nightly/
* https://hub.docker.com/r/gitea/gitea/tags?name=1.24-nightly

@wxiaoguang thanks a lot, I just re-tested with the nightly build. The 500 error message is gone and the repository is shown like before, except that the commit ID is no longer a link - which is probably intended, since the target does not exist anymore.

issue.title: Error 500 after upgrade 1.24.2 to 1.24.3 in code section

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
### Description

I experienced an error 500 when open a repository on the repository homepage and on the code page (/src).

When I downgrade to 1.24.2 browse the page works without error.

Open a specific commit works with 1.24.3, e.g. https://gitea.earth.s10r.de:2798/carsten/dotfiles/commit/199750c1b4abe6f41819e122596b9d812d7fed2e


What I did before:
- updated Debian (apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y)
- commit code to the repository from my Macbook

Browsing any other page in this repository, e.g. issues, works
Browsing any other repository (no new commits) works

Find the log file and configuration here in my Nextcloud: https://wolke.s10r.de/index.php/s/EoTRMEBNGYtdZfD

Expires: in 1 week (9. August)
Password: `gitea-1S_really_great`

I use the repository "dotfiles" to manage my config files.  The last commit has added files, changed files and removed files.



### Gitea Version

1.24.3

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

No

### Log Gist

See link to my Nextcloud in the description

### Screenshots

See link to my Nextcloud in the description

### Git Version

2.43.0

### Operating System

debian 13 trixie/sid on x86_64 running in a LXC on Proxmox 

### How are you running Gitea?

Start from systemd, config file see my Nextcloud link in the description.

I am running it on debian 13 trixie/sid on x86_64 running in a LXC on Proxmox with local MySQL 8


```
# dpkg --list|grep mysql
ii  automysqlbackup                  2.6+debian.4-4                          all          daily, weekly and monthly backup for your MySQL database
ii  mysql-client-8.0                 8.0.42-0ubuntu0.24.04.2                 amd64        MySQL database client binaries
ii  mysql-client-core-8.0            8.0.42-0ubuntu0.24.04.2                 amd64        MySQL database core client binaries
ii  mysql-common                     5.8+1.1.0build1                         all          MySQL database common files, e.g. /etc/mysql/my.cnf
ii  mysql-server                     8.0.42-0ubuntu0.24.04.2                 all          MySQL database server (metapackage depending on the latest version)
ii  mysql-server-8.0                 8.0.42-0ubuntu0.24.04.2                 amd64        MySQL database server binaries and system database setup
ii  mysql-server-core-8.0            8.0.42-0ubuntu0.24.04.2                 amd64        MySQL database server binaries
root@terra:/usr/local/bin# dpkg --list|grep git
ii  git                              1:2.43.0-1ubuntu7.3                     amd64        fast, scalable, distributed revision control system
ii  git-lfs                          3.4.1-1ubuntu0.3                        amd64        Git Large File Support
ii  git-man                          1:2.43.0-1ubuntu7.3                     all          fast, scalable, distributed revision control system (manual pages)
ii  librtmp1:amd64                   2.4+20151223.gitfa8646d.1-2build7       amd64        toolkit for RTMP streams (shared library)
ii  lshw                             02.19.git.2021.06.19.996aaad9c7-2build3 amd64        information about hardware configuration
root@terra:/usr/local/bin# dpkg --list|grep systemd
ii  dbus-user-session                1.14.10-4ubuntu4.1                      amd64        simple interprocess messaging system (systemd --user integration)
ii  libnss-systemd:amd64             255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        nss module providing dynamic user and group name resolution
ii  libpam-systemd:amd64             255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        system and service manager - PAM module
ii  libsystemd-shared:amd64          255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        systemd shared private library
ii  libsystemd0:amd64                255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        systemd utility library
ii  networkd-dispatcher              2.2.4-1                                 all          Dispatcher service for systemd-networkd connection status changes
ii  systemd                          255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        system and service manager
ii  systemd-dev                      255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       all          systemd development files
ii  systemd-hwe-hwdb                 255.1.4                                 all          udev rules for hardware enablement (HWE)
ii  systemd-resolved                 255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        systemd DNS resolver
ii  systemd-sysv                     255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        system and service manager - SysV compatibility symlinks
ii  systemd-timesyncd                255.4-1ubuntu8.10                       amd64        minimalistic service to synchronize local time with NTP servers
```

### Database

MySQL/MariaDB
